name: pff_player_seasonlogs with where
description: Test case for pff_player_seasonlogs with where
expected_query: select "player"."pid", "t42df674622ef5cfff1da167b33bc8454"."offense_rank" AS "pff_offense_rank_0", "t42df674622ef5cfff1da167b33bc8454"."offense" AS "pff_offense_0", "t42df674622ef5cfff1da167b33bc8454"."offense_snaps" AS "pff_offense_snaps_0", "t42df674622ef5cfff1da167b33bc8454"."offense_ranked" AS "pff_offense_ranked_0", player.fname, player.lname, "player"."pos" AS "pos_0", CASE WHEN rosters_players.slot = 13 THEN 'injured_reserve' WHEN rosters_players.slot = 12 THEN 'practice_squad' WHEN rosters_players.slot IS NULL THEN 'free_agent' ELSE 'active_roster' END AS player_league_roster_status, rosters_players.slot, rosters_players.tid, rosters_players.tag, "player"."pos" from "player" inner join "pff_player_seasonlogs" as "t42df674622ef5cfff1da167b33bc8454" on "t42df674622ef5cfff1da167b33bc8454"."pid" = "player"."pid" and "t42df674622ef5cfff1da167b33bc8454"."year" = ${constants.current_season.stats_season_year} left join "rosters_players" on "rosters_players"."pid" = "player"."pid" and "rosters_players"."year" = ${constants.current_season.year} and "rosters_players"."week" = ${Math.min(constants.current_season.week, constants.current_season.finalWeek)} and "rosters_players"."lid" = 1 where t42df674622ef5cfff1da167b33bc8454.offense_snaps >= '200' group by "t42df674622ef5cfff1da167b33bc8454"."offense_rank", "t42df674622ef5cfff1da167b33bc8454"."offense", "t42df674622ef5cfff1da167b33bc8454"."offense_snaps", "t42df674622ef5cfff1da167b33bc8454"."offense_ranked", player.fname, player.lname, "player"."pos", rosters_players.slot, rosters_players.tid, rosters_players.tag, "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 3 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
